title: A Role Only Ruby-chan Can Play!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>That play the other day was fun to watch~ Rin-chan, your role was so cool!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rushing like the wind! I’m Rin, the Yellow Cat!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Shioriko-chan’s role as the squadron commander and Ai-san’s role as the main villain were perfect for them~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ehehe~! I’m so proud of my team!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>If there happens to be another play, I wanna try acting in it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Oh, really!? I wonder what kind of role would suit you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, I think it would be hard to be a hero...... I don’t think I have the charisma to play a commander or a villain, either......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Hmm...... I got it!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>What is it!? What is it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Ruby-chan can be a mascot character! You’ll be the messenger from another universe who gives everyone the ability to transform and have superpowers!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>I’ll do my Rubesty!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
